champ_0230_system_01: Are you ready to face Poppy of the Elite Four?
champ_0230_steel_01a:
It’s so cool you made it this far! But this is where
you say bye-bye, mister![npcn:14]
champ_0230_steel_01b:
It’s so cool you made it this far! But this is where
you say bye-bye, miss![npcn:14]
champ_0230_steel_02: All my Pokémon are super tough![npcn:14]
champ_0230_steel_03:
Your weak attacks won’t work on them at all!
They’ll bounce right off—you’ll see![npcn:14]
champ_0230_steel_04:
I can’t wait for you to meet my friends, so...
here they come![npcn:14]
champ_0230_steel_05:
Waaaaaah! Waaaaaah! I wanted to take revenge
on you, Rika![npcn:14]
champ_0230_ground_01:
Pretty sure you mean “take revenge FOR” me,
squirt. Don’t think I did anything wrong by you.[npcn:13]
champ_0230_ground_02:
Hate to say it, but you lost, Poppy. Better call the
next guy![npcn:13]
champ_0230_steel_06:
Oh, that’s right! I haven’t had to do this in a
long time![npcn:14]
champ_0230_ground_03:
That’s two of the Elite Four down—but you’ve
got another two to go, so hang in there![npcn:13]
champ_0230_steel_08:
Mr. Larry’s real strong, y’know! Like, reeeal
strong![npcn:14]
